capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure about that, and it's a fact that's definitely true.
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never met anyone that young before, tell me more about yourself!

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and he told me that he's 11 years old. I completely agree with him on this one, I'm quite certain about it. It sounds like a pretty straightforward statement, but I suppose you never know what someone might be thinking! Anyway, yeah, Dudley is definitely 11.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. valeria is eleven years old.

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by Hagrid's love for his pets. He's got a special way with them, and they just adore him in return. I mean, who wouldn't want to spend their free time surrounded by Hippogriffs and Thestrals? It's really quite endearing.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. valeria has pets that are similar to her family line.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Dudley's eyes look really blue today. I can tell he's feeling a bit down, his blue eyes seem to be the only thing that's bright about him right now.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Flitwick is an adult. I've always thought he's a bit of a mysterious character, but now that we know his age, it makes sense why he's so wise and experienced in the wizarding world.
I've heard that Flitwick is an adult, which makes sense given his role as the Charms master at Hogwarts. I'm not surprised he's considered an adult, to be honest.
